headline: ServiceNow and NVIDIA Advance Agentic AI to Redefine Enterprise Intelligence
summary: SAN JOSE, Calif., March 18, 2025--ServiceNow and NVIDIA announce expanded partnership to advance agentic AI with new tools and integration with NVIDIA Llama Nemotron models.

raw.headline: ServiceNow and NVIDIA Advance Agentic AI to Redefine Enterprise Intelligence

headline: West Monroe Joins ServiceNow (NYSE:NOW) Partner Program To Transform Customer Service Operations
summary: ServiceNow (NYSE:NOW) has gained attention with a 7.5% price increase over the past week, notably coinciding with its new partnership with West Monroe aimed at enhancing customer service operations through the ServiceNow platform. This partnership aligns with the recent launch of ServiceNow’s Yokohama platform, showcasing advancements in automation and AI. These developments in product innovation and strategic collaborations highlight the company’s active role in advancing customer service...

headline: ServiceNow price target lowered to $1,050 from $1,230 at Scotiabank
summary: Scotiabank lowered the firm’s price target on ServiceNow (NOW) to $1,050 from $1,230 and keeps an Outperform rating on the shares. With demand trends worsening and recession odds rising, the firm favors market leaders in the software and services sector, specifically those with strong free cash flow that can benefit from AI, the analyst tells investors. headline: ServiceNow CFO pledges M&A ‘discipline’ amid AI mega-deal
summary: The enterprise software company is seeking to acquire AI startup Moveworks for $2.85 billion.
